org.eclipse.scada.configuration.component

Interface ScriptModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CalculationModule, Documentable, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptModuleImpl

    public interface ScriptModule
extends Documentable, CalculationModule
    A representation of the model object 'Script Module'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Inputs
    • Outputs
    • Script Engine

    See Also:
    ComponentPackage.getScriptModule()

      • getScriptEngine

        java.lang.String getScriptEngine()
        Returns the value of the 'Script Engine' attribute. The default value is "JavaScript".

        If the meaning of the 'Script Engine' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        Returns:
        the value of the 'Script Engine' attribute.
        See Also:
        setScriptEngine(String), ComponentPackage.getScriptModule_ScriptEngine()
